author: Erin Schumaker, MaryAlice Parks
title: Rural hospitals rely on city safety nets. Coronavirus might take that away
description: Rural hospitals face a precarious situation in dealing with the pandemic because of their reliance on cities.
content:
In normal times, Mammoth Lakes relies on tourists skiers who fly into the 8,000-person California mountain town in the winter, and hikers and fishermen who flock there in the summer for its livelihood.
Mammoth Lakes' remote location, three hours from Reno, N… [+11784 chars]
